audioText: À la suite de l'incident, la direction a décidé de renforcer les mesures de sécurité dans tous les bureaux.
question: What happened following the incident?
options: Management decided to strengthen security measures in all offices
The company reduced working hours for all employees
All employees received additional safety training
The incident was ignored and no changes were made
explanation: The phrase 'À la suite de l'incident' means 'Following the incident'. Management decided to strengthen security measures in all offices.
